subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Discrimination
Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
lead_paragraph: Mike Priefer rejoined the Vikings, completing a two-game suspension and two weeks of anti-harassment training, a team-imposed punishment for making a homophobic slur at a 2012 special-teams meeting.
snippet: Mike Priefer rejoined the Vikings, completing a two-game suspension and two weeks of anti-harassment training, a team-imposed punishment for making a homophobic slur at a 2012 special-teams meeting.
